translation.en: [officer 1, on radio] 3654. We have foot pursuit outside of PNC Park.
translation.ko: 3654, PNC 파크 밖에서 도보 추격 중이다

translation.en: [officer 2] 3169, here on Stockton Avenue. Heading down.
[officer 3] 438972. Suspect description, black jacket, black pants.
translation.ko: 438972, 용의자는 검은 재킷에 검은 바지 차림이다

translation.en: [officer 4] Mayor requests we lock down. Lock it down on all four corners.
translation.ko: 시장님 요청이니 봉쇄하라 반복한다, 사방을 봉쇄하라

translation.en: [officer 3] Copy.
[officer 5] Suspect on foot. I repeat, suspect on foot.
[officer 6] Can we confirm present location of suspect?
[officer 5] Got eyes on the suspect. Following.
[officer 7] Dispatch, 3227. Be advised, suspect is entering PNC Park.
translation.ko: 본부, 여기는 3227 용의자가 PNC 파크에 진입한다

translation.en: [officer 8] Suspect carrying backpack moving through PNC.
translation.ko: 수상한 배낭을 멘 미상의 용의자가 PNC 파크를 통과한다

translation.en: [officer 9] On the move!
[officer 10] Clear the area! Get out of my way!
translation.ko: 헬기 정찰대는 더 투입했나? 여기는 현장이다

translation.en: -[officer 11, on radio] I'm on-site. -[officer 12] Move!
translation.ko: 헬기 정찰대는 더 투입했나? 여기는 현장이다 비키세요!

translation.en: [officer 13, on radio] Unit One-Two. I got your call. Negative.
We have no visual. We have got no ID at this time.
translation.ko: 용의자는 안 보이고 현재로선 신원도 모른다

translation.en: [officer 14, on radio] Suspect is on the roof.
Officers in pursuit.
[officer 12] Ray!
Just come with me, okay?
I'm here to help.
It's over.
Just…
It wasn't supposed to be like this.
No, no, no, no!
[Ray, echoing] The past is like a dream.
-[birds singing] -[water flowing]
[Ray] There are memories that shape us,
molding us into what we've become.
A mosaic of images and feelings
that offers some truth about how we got here,
translation.ko: 우릴 현재로 이끈 일말의 진실을 나타내지

translation.en: even if details have blurred with time.
-You know this is all yours? -[Young Rachel chuckles]
What ya lookin' at, man?
I'm lookin' at you, woman.
-I love you. -[Young Rachel] Love you too.
[Ray] As the years pass, we realize
we are nothing more than the experiences that made us.
translation.ko: 우린 우리를 만든 경험의 총체일 뿐이다

translation.en: -[doctor] Hi, Amanda. -Hi.
-[Ray] Doc. -[doctor] Mr. Cooper.
Is it back?
[doctor] Yes. We'll go over the options,
but Infirmam is still the most effective way to cure this type of cancer.
We've already leveraged everything.
[Ray] The pain has brought us closer together.
And watching her grow… has been to find myself again.
translation.ko: 그 아이의 성장을 지켜보며 나는 나를 되찾았다

translation.en: [all] Surprise!
Here, mama. This is for you.
I mean, it's not much, but it's all they had at the gift shop.
-Oh. -[Amanda] Her name is Paloma.
No, it's perfect. Thank you, Mom.
translation.ko: - 이름은 팔로마야 - 엄마, 최고예요 고마워요, 엄마

translation.en: [Ray] But sometimes I wonder,
"Are these my memories,
or are they hers?"
-[Ray grunting] -[coach] Put your hips into it. Again.
-[Ray grunts] Ooh. -[laughs] Ooh, that was clean.
-Lock that wrist so it don't get weak. -It won't!
translation.ko: 손목을 펴야 힘이 안 빠져 그럴 일 없거든요?

translation.en: There are no rules in a fight, people do not--
-Whoa! -Fight fair!
-[both grunt] -[Ray] How do you win an unfair fight?
-[Rachel] You always fight harder. -That's right.
[man] Let me train her, Coop. She's got what it takes.
translation.ko: 내가 가르쳐 볼게, 쿠퍼 애가 타고났잖아

translation.en: -That's my sweet girl. -[laughs]
-[Rachel] Done. -Done?
Thank you, baby.
[Ray] Parents and their children.
Where do we stop and they begin?
translation.ko: 언제 우리가 물러나고 아이의 삶이 시작될까?

translation.en: Mr. Cooper. Ray.
-Doc. -I have good news.
We just got word
a very effective generic version of Infirmam, called Spero,
is in the final stages of FDA approval.
[softly] This is great news, Ray.
Did you do this?
-You did, didn't you? -[Rachel] What?
This was your birthday wish, wasn't it? [kisses]
I love you. Let's go tell Mom.
We were supposed to start a new medication.
You know when that's supposed to happen?
I… You'll have to talk with Dr. Wu.
[Rachel] Dad, what's happening?
[Ray] Dr. Wu?
Dr. Wu!
-[Wu] Hi, Ray. -What's goin' on?
You said Amanda was gonna start Spero soon.
I'm sorry.
Amanda's on my list of patients to see.
The company that makes the generic drug
pulled it off the market.
What are you talkin' about?
BioPrime, the makers of Infirmam,
paid the manufacturer to delay Spero's release.
translation.ko: 제조 업체를 매수해서 스페로의 출시를 늦췄어요

translation.en: -Delay? -For how long?
Indefinitely.
Ray.
You told me that my wife was gonna be okay.
I am delivering the same news to three other patients today…
translation.ko: 그 소식을 전할 환자가 세 명 더 있는데

translation.en: [quietly] …two of them kids.
I am so sorry.
I'm sorry.
-[news fanfare plays] -[host] Welcome back.
For those just joining, I'm here with BioPrime CEO, Simon Keeley,
translation.ko: 오늘의 초대 손님은 바이오프라임의 CEO 사이먼 킬리 씨와

translation.en: and Congresswoman Diana Morgan of Pennsylvania.
Congresswoman Morgan, why are you here today?
Well, I've always taken a hard line against pharmaceutical lobbies
translation.ko: 전 제약사 로비 문제에 늘 강경한 태도였죠

translation.en: and mass corporations, like BioPrime.
With all due respect, Congresswoman,
BioPrime is unlike any other pharmaceutical company in the world.
translation.ko: 바이오프라임 같은 제약사는 세상에 또 없습니다

translation.en: -[TV volume raises] -[Keeley] Our scientists have created
the most effective treatments in the fight against cancer.
Specifically with Infirmam, a drug that has increased life expectancy
translation.ko: 특히 인퍼맴이라는 약물은 전체 치료 환자 중 86%의 기대 수명을 늘렸죠

translation.en: in 86% of patients treated.
translation.ko: 전체 치료 환자 중 86%의 기대 수명을 늘렸죠

translation.en: Mr. Keeley, it is not the efficacy that's in question.
It's the business practices. It's the company's business practices.
I believe that we all have a basic human right
to safe, affordable medication.
Yeah. Um, this talking point of health care as a human right.
translation.ko: 의원님의 논지는 의료 서비스를 하나의 인권으로 보지만

translation.en: Our medicines, they are a matter of research and science.
The investment is not only risky, it is extremely expensive.
translation.ko: 이러한 투자는 위험할 뿐만 아니라 매우 값비싸죠

translation.en: [Langley] All right. We have eager callers that wanna weigh in.
translation.ko: 네, 토론에 동참하실 시청자 의견을 들어 보죠

translation.en: [caller] Can you please explain? Because I just don't understand.
translation.ko: 설명 좀 해 주시죠 이해가 안 돼서요

translation.en: It's crazy that a pill can cost that much.
-Yeah, this is, uh, a tricky issue. -[line ringing]
Uh, and don't get fooled by the talking points of… of politicians from Washington.
translation.ko: 워싱턴 정치인들의 논지에 속으시면 안 됩니다

translation.en: Mr. Keeley, according to your own internal documents,
translation.ko: 킬리 씨 귀사의 내부 문서를 보면

translation.en: the cost of an entire course of treatment is only four dollars.
You're absolutely right. A… A course of treatment is four dollars.
But it's funny how you failed to mention the billions of dollars spent on…
translation.ko: 이것도 언급하셔야죠 수십억 달러의 연구 개발비와…

translation.en: -[operator] Your name? -Ray Cooper.
…rebates, discounts, insurance companies, wholesalers. Look,
I'm here because BioPrime
is committed to healing the world.
And if you look at the numbers, that is exactly what we're doing.
translation.ko: 수치가 증명하듯 그게 우리가 하는 일입니다

translation.en: -[scoffs] That is not what you are doing. -All right.
Just to interject, our next caller is from Pittsburgh.
Ray, do you have something to say to Mr. Keeley?
translation.ko: 레이 씨, 킬리 씨께 드릴 말씀 있나요?

translation.en: My wife is dying in a hospital because you pulled Spero off the market.
translation.ko: 내 아내가 병원에서 죽어 가요 그쪽이 스페로의 출시를 막아서요

translation.en: Paying competitors to shelve generic brands of drugs?
[scoffs] That is immoral, Mr. Keeley.
Well… [clears throat] …Ray…
Is it-- Should-- Can I? Uh, I just wanna talk to Ray directly.
Listen.
Uh, first of all, I'd just like to say I'm so sorry
translation.ko: 일단 드리고 싶은 말씀은 부인 소식은 매우 유감입니다

translation.en: to hear about your wife.
Uh, believe it or not,
BioPrime is dedicated to saving lives.
Saving lives? You're geared towards makin' a profit.
translation.ko: 생명을 구해요? 수익을 내는 게 목표면서

translation.en: We've already refinanced our house. I've taken every double shift I can get.
translation.ko: 집 융자도 새로 받았고 틈만 나면 2교대로 일하는데

translation.en: You've already taken everything from me!
[Keeley] Ray, the sad reality is that cancer
is still very often a death sentence.
translation.ko: 여전히 많은 환자에게 암은 사형 선고죠

translation.en: In the short term, what would we give?
[hesitates] What is the cost
of spending just a little bit more time with a loved one?
translation.ko: 조금 더 오래 함께할 수 있다면 그 시간의 가치는 얼마일까요?

translation.en: A year, a… a month, a day?
Mmm, it's impossible to put a price on.
If my wife dies,
it's your death sentence.
I will hunt you down and kill you with my bare hands.
[Rachel] Dad?
[weakly] What ya lookin' at, man?
[softly] I'm lookin' at you, woman.
Oh God!
[shouting] No!
Fuck, no!
Amanda, no!
[softly] Bye.
-[Ray] Ah, God damn it. -[Rachel] What? Hospital bill?
Just… put it at the bottom of the pile.
-We can't ignore it. -[Rachel] Sure you can.
translation.ko: 마냥 무시할 순 없잖아 왜 안 돼요?

translation.en: -[stove clicks] -We voted for universal health care. Just…
tell 'em we're taking a political stance.
translation.ko: 정치적 입장 때문에 돈 못 낸다고 해요

translation.en: No, we are not eating that three nights in a row.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 3일 저녁 연속으로 그걸 먹자고?

translation.en: -C'mon. You know you love this too. -[Ray] It's not happening.
translation.ko: 왜요, 아빠도 좋아하면서 절대 안 돼 채소 들어간 요리 시키자

translation.en: We're gonna order something with vegetables.
translation.ko: 절대 안 돼 채소 들어간 요리 시키자

translation.en: -[Rachel laughing] -Fries do not count.
-[Rachel] Hey! -No. Stop.
-Ah! Stop ticklin' me. -[cell phone vibrates]
[Ray chuckles] Stop it.
-Hello? -[man on phone] Ray Cooper?
My name is Martin Bennett. I'm a journalist for VICE.
I'm doing a story on BioPrime, and I saw your call with Simon Keeley on TV.
translation.ko: 바이오프라임을 취재 중인데 방송에서 사이먼 킬리와 통화하신 거 봤습니다

translation.en: [Ray] What do you want?
I can help you get justice for what happened to your wife.
No, you can't. I've been down that road.
I have proof that crimes have been committed.
Crimes that can land some very powerful people in jail.
translation.ko: 힘 있는 자들을 감방에 처넣을 범죄요

translation.en: -Keeley? -Who's that?
Especially Keeley. We need to talk in person.
-You can talk now. Now you have me. -Not over the phone.
translation.ko: 통화한 김에 지금 말해요 전화론 안 됩니다

translation.en: Meet me at Gateway Station in 20 minutes. I won't waste your time.
translation.ko: 게이트웨이역에서 20분 후에 만나죠 시간이 아깝진 않을 겁니다

translation.en: -[call disconnects] -[Rachel] Who was that?
[Ray] I'll be right back.
What do you want? Chinese or Subway?
No, it's cool. I'll come with you, and we can pick it up on the way.
Not gonna happen, Rae. Sit there and finish that homework.
[Rachel] That's not fair.
Life's not fair.
Chinese?
Lock the door behind me.
-I love you. -Love you. [sighs]
[Ray] Excuse me.
Yeah, I'm here. Where are you?
-[Bennett] Get on the incoming train. -[Ray] You were supposed to meet me here.
translation.ko: 이번 열차에 타요 뭡니까? 여기서 보자더니

translation.en: Trust me, Ray. Just get on the train.
Are you on the train?
-Yeah. Now what? -Don't hang up. Just stay on the line.
translation.ko: - 탑승했나요? - 네, 인제 어쩌죠? 끊지 말고 계속 통화해요

translation.en: Just sit tight.
Get off at this station.
Okay, where now?
There's a woman in a striped coat and a hipster guy with a scarf.
translation.ko: 줄무늬 코트 입은 여자랑 스카프 두른 남자가

translation.en: -You see where they're headed? -Yeah. To street level.
All right. There's a guy in a denim jacket going up the stairs.
translation.ko: 좋아요 데님 재킷 입은 남자가 계단을 오르는데

translation.en: I want you to follow that guy. Hang back, but don't lose him.
translation.ko: 그 사람을 따라가요 거리 유지하면서 놓치지 마요

translation.en: Stand by.
Head to the south platform
and take the Red Line towards Allegheny Station. Okay?
translation.ko: 남쪽 플랫폼에서 빨간 노선을 타고 앨러게니역 방향으로 가요 알았죠?

translation.en: Stay on the line.
-Bennett? -Yeah. Martin.
Look, sorry about all this train hopping, but it's just a precaution.
Okay, honestly,
I'm a little afraid of how deep this thing might go.
What does that mean?
I got a source who told me about BioPrime's payouts
to multiple offshore shell corporations.
translation.ko: 다수의 역외 유령 회사에 배당금을 지급했대요

translation.en: Bribery, cover-ups, who knows what else. All this leads to Simon Keeley.
translation.ko: 뇌물 수수, 은폐부터 그보다 더한 짓까지 전부 사이먼 킬리와 엮였죠

translation.en: There are other players at both the state and federal level.
translation.ko: 주와 연방 정부 쪽에도 연루자가 있어요

translation.en: But recently, communication went silent.
You told me you had proof.
[Bennett] Enough to tie Keeley to bribes that pulled Spero off the market.
translation.ko: 킬리가 스페로의 출시를 뇌물로 막았다는 증거는 있지만

translation.en: But without my source, I can't connect the dots.
You're wastin' my time.
[Bennett] I have enough to bring public concern against BioPrime,
but I do not have enough to take them down.
That's why I need you, your story.
translation.ko: 그래서 당신이 필요해요 - 당신 사연요 - 난…

translation.en: -I just-- -Look, just think about it.
translation.ko: - 당신 사연요 - 난… 생각이나 해 봐요 이렇게 가죠

translation.en: Look, "Local family gets ravaged by Big Pharma's greed."
[Bennett] You gotta help me, Ray.
Family, human interest. That's what grabs headlines.
We can blow this thing wide open.
We can take down BioPrime. We can bring Simon Keeley to his knees.
translation.ko: 바이오프라임을 무너뜨리고 킬리를 쓰러트릴 수 있어요

translation.en: -Hey! -[blade swishes]
Dad!
Run!
Hey!
[groans] Rachel. Rachel, baby, are you okay? Look at me.
-[coach] Just like your dad. -[Rachel grunting]
-Not about strength. -[both grunting]
Okay, top. Top. Up, up, up!
Hands up. Hands up. Move.
Again. Hit him again. Control him. Let's go.
Come on. You can take anyone.
Beautiful. There it is.
Nice. Top, top, top, top! Watch the scramble.
All right.
Hooks in. Get it. Get him in. Here.
Pick your shots.
That's it. Open him up.
-[both grunt] -[coach] You got it. Lock it in.
Beautiful.
Just hold. Hold, hold.
[coach] He's tapping, Rachel.
Rachel, he's tapping.
-He's tapping, Rachel. Rachel! -[sounds fading]
[coach] Rachel!
[coach] Rachel!
Today, I am thrilled to announce a bipartisan bill
translation.ko: 오늘 기쁜 마음으로 발표할 양당 법안은

translation.en: that will make true progress in the war to find a cure for cancer.
translation.ko: 항암 치료제 개발 전쟁에 큰 진척을 불러올 겁니다

translation.en: In collaboration with the CDC and the NIH,
translation.ko: 질병 통제 센터 및 국립 보건원과 협력하여

translation.en: we are creating a strategic partnership with BioPrime Pharmaceuticals.
translation.ko: 바이오프라임 제약과 전략적 제휴를 맺게 됐는데요

translation.en: Thanks to the effort of BioPrime CEO, Simon Keeley,
and chairman, Vinod Shah,
this bill will effectively cap the cost of treatment.
translation.ko: 본 법안은 치료비에 상한선을 도입할 겁니다

translation.en: Finally, many of BioPrime's breakthrough treatments
that used to cost in the hundreds of thousands of dollars
will now be available to the public at affordable prices.
translation.ko: 일반 국민도 저렴한 가격에 이용하게 된 겁니다

translation.en: I told the American people
that I would hold companies like BioPrime accountable,
translation.ko: 바이오프라임 같은 업체의 책임을 묻겠다고 했는데요

translation.en: and I have delivered on that promise.
We are cleaning out the rot.
[Ray] Again?
I wasn't watching it. You were.
I had a dream last night
about that trip we took with Mom in the woods.
My memory's kind of fading of her.
I don't know. It's like I'm losing these tiny pieces of her every day, and I just…
translation.ko: 매일 엄마의 조각을 조금씩 잃는 느낌인데…

translation.en: I don't know. I miss her. I miss our family.
Me too.
I miss her too.
What are you planning to do?
I just need to make sense of this.
-I need to know. -Just… Just leave it alone, okay?
translation.ko: - 답을 알아야지 - 그냥… 그냥 포기해요, 네?

translation.en: They already investigated, and they didn't find anything.
Or the guy who tried to kill you.
translation.ko: 아빠를 죽이려 한 놈도 못 찾았고요

translation.en: It just was a dead-end conspiracy.
-I don't believe that. -[Rachel sighs]
You don't believe that.
I need to try.
Keep it close, Mike.
translation.ko: 멀리 가진 마 얼마나 걸릴지 모르겠다

translation.en: -I don't know how long I'll be. -[Mike] Yes, sir.
translation.ko: 멀리 가진 마 얼마나 걸릴지 모르겠다 알겠습니다

translation.en: -Mr. Keeley. -Ah.
Appreciate it. -Don't let me go dry tonight, will you? -[server chuckles]
[announcer] Good evening. I'm proud to kick off this first annual event
translation.ko: 안녕하십니까, 여러분 이번 초대 행사를 시작하며

translation.en: by introducing you to the CEO of BioPrime,
Mr. Simon Keeley.
[man] Nice to see you, Simon.
Thank you.
Thank you very much. Hello, everyone.
T. S. Eliot said,
"We shall not cease in exploration."
We've joined forces with Goa Capital Partners
translation.ko: 오늘 우리는 고아 캐피털 파트너스와 손잡고

translation.en: in hopes of raising ten million dollars…
For-- That's right. I know you got it.
Excuse me.
[Keeley, over speakers] For medicine and assistance…
for children in Africa.
India. Sorry. [laughs awkwardly]
Either way, both places need a lot of help.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 두 지역 모두 큰 도움이 필요하죠

translation.en: -Thanks again for coming. -[guests clap]
Ladies and gentlemen, Mr. Simon Keeley.
translation.ko: 신사 숙녀 여러분 사이먼 킬리 씨였습니다

translation.en: Simon, Simon, Simon.
India, Africa? Africa, India?
You know what? I am so sick of doing your job for ya.
translation.ko: 당신 역할을 대신하는 것도 지겨워 죽겠네요

translation.en: I'm doing my job, Simon. Everyone's here because of me.
translation.ko: 내 역할은 했는데? 다들 내 덕에 모인걸

translation.en: There's some important people here.
Might want to mingle with more than your cocktails.
Sure, all right. Good to see ya.
-[drink spills] -What the fuck?
Who would…?
-[bodyguard 1] Sir? -[Keeley] You kidding? Give me a napkin.
…why I agree to participate in this bullshit in the first place.
translation.ko: 애초에 여기까지 왜 뺑이 치러 왔나 몰라

translation.en: -[auctioneer] Let's start the auction. -Fucking balls are wet.
-[bodyguard 2] It's out of order. -No shit. How'd you figure that out?
translation.ko: - 고장입니다 - 셜록 홈스 납셨군 그건 어떻게 알았나?

translation.en: Sir. Sir, there's another bathroom down the stairs.
[Keeley] Well, let's go to it, then. All right?
Wait here. Keep a lookout.
-[Ray] Hmm? -What the… fuck? You were warned.
If anything happened to her, I would hunt you down.
translation.ko: 그 사람이 잘못되면 널 찾아낼 거라고

translation.en: All made her suffer, but she died because of you.
translation.ko: 다들 내 아내를 괴롭혔지만 너 때문에 죽은 거야

translation.en: I didn't kill anyone, you psycho fuck. Cancer did.
translation.ko: 난 아무도 안 죽였어, 이 사이코야 암이 죽인 거지

translation.en: You paid someone to kill Martin Bennett.
-What? Martin? -He was investigating your bribes.
translation.ko: - 뭐라고? - 네 뇌물 건을 캔 기자

translation.en: What the… What are you talking about? I don't know any Martin Bennett.
translation.ko: 대체 뭐라는 거야? 마틴 베넷이 누군데?

translation.en: -You're the goddamn CEO of BioPrime. -All right.
I authorize a bribe now and again, but it's not like I read the fine print.
translation.ko: 가끔 뇌물 수수를 승인해도 내가 일일이 다 챙기진 않아

translation.en: [yelling] Okay, now, stop! Stop!
Fuck!
All right. Uh… [grunts]
It must have been Vinod Shah. Okay?
Nothing happens without his sign-off. He's the one that brought me on, okay?
translation.ko: 그자가 최종 결정권자고 그 사람이 날 끌어들였다고

translation.en: You have no idea what you're getting into.
-Get him. -[tense music playing]
-[Ray groans] -[Keeley] Hey!
Here. Handle it. Do it!
-[blade slashes] -[bodyguard 2 screams] Fuck!
No!
Come here, you little bitch!
-[Ray exhales shakily] -[auctioneer] Sold! 50,000 dollars.
Rae?
Rachel.
Rachel.
[Rachel] Dad? You're hurt.
[Ray] I'm fine. I need you to pack up. Only what we need.
translation.ko: 난 괜찮아, 짐 싸라 꼭 필요한 것만

translation.en: -[Rachel] When are we coming back? -[Ray] We're not.
Is that his blood?
I… I had no choice. He had a gun.
I told you not to do this.
People are gonna come after us, aren't they?
[Ray] I don't know.
But we need to go. Please go pack our stuff.
translation.ko: 그래도 도망쳐야 해 부탁이니 짐 싸라

translation.en: [loudly] Go pack!
Mr. Asbury, I'm Special Agent Sarah Meeker.
translation.ko: 애즈버리 씨 특수 요원 세라 미커입니다

translation.en: I already gave a statement.
[Meeker] Your partner, he took a bullet to the head tonight.
Did you hear any gunshots?
[Asbury] No.
Did you hear anything at all before losing consciousness?
translation.ko: 의식을 잃기 전에 들으신 소리는 없고요?

translation.en: Somethin' about a woman.
Said, uh…
"All of them made her suffer."
-Or… "All made her suffer." I don't know. -What do you mean? All what? All who?
translation.ko: '세상이 내 아내를 괴롭혔어' 아니면 '다들 내 아내를 괴롭혔어' 뭐 그랬죠 '다들'이라면 누구요?

translation.en: -I don't know. -Okay.
-Do you remember anything else? -No.
-[Asbury sighs] -Thank you.
Come on.
But wait.
Whoever it was said they warned him.
They said they'd come for Mr. Keeley if anything happened to the woman.
translation.ko: 그 여자가 잘못되면 킬리 씨를 노릴 거라고요

translation.en: All right. Thank you.
Let's do a check on all death threats Keeley may have gotten in the past.
translation.ko: 킬리가 살해 협박을 받은 전적이 있나 알아보자

translation.en: [agent] You got it.
[Ray] It's a long drive to Toronto on these back roads.
Especially if we're not talking.
-♪ Who throws the dice ♪ -You gonna come sit up here?
[Rachel grunts softly] Talk to Paloma.
We ran all the Keeley death threats, and we got a match.
translation.ko: 킬리가 받은 살해 협박 중에 들어맞는 게 있어

translation.en: Her name is Amanda Cooper.
Died at Carnegie Medical a few years back.
translation.ko: 카네기 병원에서 몇 년 전에 사망했는데

translation.en: Her husband's Oldsmobile was at the auction.
translation.ko: 그 사람 남편 차가 경매장에 있었고

translation.en: And we found this too.
[Keeley] It's impossible to put a price on.
[Ray] If my wife dies, it's your death sentence.
translation.ko: 내 아내가 죽으면 그건 네 사형 선고야

translation.en: I will hunt you down and kill you with my bare hands.
-[Langley] We're gonna take-- -[Meeker hits key] "All made her suffer"?
translation.ko: 잠시 쉬었다가… - '다들 내 아내를 괴롭혔다'? - 그래

translation.en: -Right. [chuckles] -[Meeker exhales]
Let's put an APB out on Cooper's vehicle.
[attendant] Here you are.
[man] Got the ID on the driver.
How do you wanna handle this?
[Ray] Evening.
[Ray] I'll be right up.
-[phone rings] -This is Meeker.
[Rachel] You're the agent assigned to what happened at the UNICEF fundraiser.
translation.ko: 유니세프 모금 행사 사건 담당 요원님이시죠?

translation.en: If you have any information, please call the tip line.
translation.ko: 사건 제보는 전담 연락처로 해 주세요

translation.en: -An agent will get back to you. -Yeah, I called the tip line.
translation.ko: - 요원이 연락드릴 겁니다 - 네, 그쪽에 전화해서

translation.en: -I told them I'm only talkin' to you. -And who am I speaking to?
Simon Keeley's death was an accident.
-It was self-defense. -How do you know that? Who is this?
I'm gonna tell you everything that happened.
If you want a crime, look at…
look at what Keeley did.
How many cancer patients died because of him? Thousands? More?
translation.ko: 그자 때문에 죽은 암 환자가 수천 명쯤 될까요? 아니면 그 이상요?

translation.en: Where are you, Rachel?
-Goodbye. -Wait, I can help you.
My dad doesn't know I'm doing this.
He's a good man. He… He just needs help.
translation.ko: 아빠는 좋은 분이신데 도움이 필요하실 뿐이죠

translation.en: Do you need help?
I'm fine.
But I know you think he's guilty.
You've all made up your minds.
But you're wrong.
He's a good, honest man.
And I… need him.
He's all I got.
Do you have cash?
Why?
When you can, get to a… a gas station or a Walmart.
They have disposable phones, a burner.
Okay? You get one, and you call me back.
My number is 412-046-4378.
Okay? No one will be able to trace it. Okay? It's safe.
translation.ko: 아무도 추적 못 하는 안전한 번호거든

translation.en: Now say it back to me. It's 412-046-4--
-[call disconnects] -[quietly] Fuck.
Where'd you get that?
Did you steal that?
I'm just looking at it.
It's fine.
What? It's not like business is booming down there.
-Twenty dollars? Seriously? -[Rachel sighs]
We're not done.
Look, I know you've always taught me to do the right thing, okay?
translation.ko: 아빠, 늘 옳은 일을 하라고 가르치신 건 알지만

translation.en: But we're here because of you.
Rachel, look at me. Look at me. We gotta go.
[Ray] Come on.
-[pounding on door] -[agent] FBI! We have permission to gain entry.
FBI!
[agent] Meeker.
Whoa. We definitely got our suspect.
[Meeker] It's Torres.
You got something?
What?
Where'd this happen?
Yeah, okay. Thank you.
So, that APB we put out on Ray Cooper's vehicle?
It was spotted fleeing the scene of a double homicide 70 miles north of here.
translation.ko: 북쪽으로 110km 떨어진 이중 살인 현장에서 도주했대요

translation.en: Rae, I don't think I can make it to Toronto.
You know those men were sent to kill us.
I had no choice.
I just hate this.
[man] It runs, if you're askin'.
Like an odds-on favorite at the Kentucky Derby.
[hit man] You take cash?
[Ray] We need to stay off the road until I figure out what's goin' on.
translation.ko: 상황 파악이 될 때까진 도로를 피해야겠다

translation.en: I'm gonna look around.
You wanna come with me?
Okay.
I'll be right back.
If they found us at the motel, they'll find us anywhere.
translation.ko: 모텔까지 우릴 따라왔다면 어딜 가든 잡힐 거예요

translation.en: It's gonna be okay, Rae. I'm gonna keep you safe.
translation.ko: 다 괜찮을 거다, 레이 아빠가 지켜 줄게

translation.en: They're coming to hurt you.
That's why I need to stop this. It needs to finish.
translation.ko: 그러니 내 손으로 멈춰야지 끝장을 봐야 해

translation.en: [Ray] I have to go after Shah.
[Rachel] You plan on using that?
No, but I need to be ready.
Do you know how to shoot it? It's not a hunting rifle.
-[gun cocks] -You know I do, Rae.
So, what is your plan?
It's better to have it and not need it than need it and not have it.
translation.ko: 필요한데 없는 것보단 대비하는 게 낫잖아

translation.en: We need protection.
Okay, so all the values you taught me growing up
translation.ko: 네, 그러니까 지금껏 아빠가 가르쳐 준 교훈을

translation.en: are out the window?
As long as we're on the same page, dope.
Shit.
-[phone unlocks] -This is Meeker.
[Rachel] There are people that are coming after us. Rachel?
I don't know who. I don't know what he's gonna do, but…
translation.ko: 놈들은 대체 누구고 아빠는 어쩌려는 건지…

translation.en: Who, your dad?
Look, I've been tryin' to stop him, but I can't.
translation.ko: 아빠를 막으려고 했는데 말이 안 통해요

translation.en: The only person he would ever listen to is my mom.
-Can you tell me about her? -She…
translation.ko: 어머님 얘기 좀 해 볼래? 엄마는…

translation.en: She was a dancer.
[sighs] She had, uh…
tendinitis and stress fractures.
My dad, I mean, he sparred with guys who could take a punch.
translation.ko: 아빠랑 스파링 뛰던 맷집 센 남자들도

translation.en: But you could tell that they were in pain. You saw it. You know?
But when my mom danced,
she'd just smile.
She always smiled.
She's tough. Like you.
You don't know me.
Debate,
gymnastics, judo junior Olympian,
a 3.5 GPA.
You've been checking up on me?
Well, I'm an FBI agent.
I do have one question.
Who is… Paloma?
How do you know about Paloma?
I'm looking at a photo that says "Rachel and Paloma."
I… wanted a pet. [sighs]
But we couldn't get one because of my mom's treatments, so…
translation.ko: 근데 엄마 치료 때문에 그럴 형편이 못 됐죠

translation.en: so she got me a stuffed bunny.
translation.ko: 그래서 엄마가 토끼 인형을 선물해 줬어요

translation.en: Paloma.
You…
She was always, uh, looking out for me.
Even when she couldn't. [sighs]
You'd make her proud.
And your dad.
[breathing shakily] I don't know what he's gonna do.
Hey. Listen to me.
You are in control.
Um, but I'm… I'm not. I'm really not.
-You are in control. -Stop saying that.
translation.ko: - 통제권은 너한테 있어 - 그만 좀 해요

translation.en: You are in control. You are Rachel Cooper.
translation.ko: 전부 너한테 달렸다니까 넌 레이철 쿠퍼잖니

translation.en: Say your name.
-Rachel Cooper. -Say it again.
Rachel Cooper. [sighs]
That's it.
Turn the ignition on.
Tur--
What are you doin'?
-[clicks switch] -[Rachel] I'm coming with you.
[Ray] No, you're not.
-[Rachel] I'm not leaving you. -This isn't a debate.
translation.ko: 아빠 혼자 못 보내요 토 달지 마라

translation.en: -You can't do this without me. -I am not putting you in danger, Rae.
translation.ko: 저 없인 안 되잖아요 널 위험에 빠트릴 순 없어

translation.en: This conversation's over. Get outta the car.
What about the motel?
That was unplanned. Pump the gas.
translation.ko: 그건 계획에 없던 일이고 기름 넣어라

translation.en: Promise you'll be back. Promise.
I'll be back.
Pinky swear.
I said, I promise.
Get outta the car.
Rae.
[sighs] You always say I have to fight harder, so…
translation.ko: 맨날 저더러 더 기를 쓰고 싸우라더니

translation.en: What?
[gently] I need you to get outta the car.
Get outta the car.
As long as we're together, we're still a family.
Okay? So if you can't promise me that we'll be together,
translation.ko: 서로 함께할 거라고 약속 못 한다면

translation.en: then I'm coming with you.
[Ray] Not this time.
[quietly] Put your seat belt on.
Nice house.
How you gonna get in there?
-I'm not. -[tense music playing]
Dad.
[Ray] What's this guy doin'?
[Rachel] Look.
[Shah] Okay. Keep an eye on your sister. See you at the airport.
translation.ko: 그래, 동생 잘 챙겨라 공항에서 보자

translation.en: Hold on.
This is Victor One. We've got a flat tire.
translation.ko: 여기는 빅터 원 타이어에 펑크가 났다

translation.en: Stay behind.
[Shah] What is this?
Something's wrong. Get us out of here.
Forward! Go! Go! Move, move!
Just break through it! Drive!
[driver] Come on! Let's go!
Fuck.
Get me out of here.
-Finish him. -[bodyguard] Go!
[Ray] Rachel, someone else is here. Stay in the car.
translation.ko: 레이철, 누가 또 있네 차에서 기다려

translation.en: You're gonna tell me why Martin Bennett was killed.
There's nowhere to go. We can get to anyone.
translation.ko: 도망칠 곳은 없어 우린 누구든 찾아내지

translation.en: You killed a reporter to cover up bribes. Who were they paid out to?
translation.ko: 뇌물 수수를 은폐하려고 기자를 죽였잖아 뇌물은 누구한테 뿌렸지?

translation.en: Soon, some powerful people are gonna be looking for a little girl
translation.ko: 조만간 힘 있는 사람들이 부모를 다 잃은 여자애나 찾아다니겠군

translation.en: who lost both her parents.
[Rachel, echoing] Daddy!
-I know there's others. Who are they? -You don't have what it takes.
translation.ko: 또 누구랑 한패지? 쏠 배짱도 없으면서

translation.en: -[gunshot] -[Ray grunts] Whoa!
[Ray] Go!
Dad?
-[engine cuts out] -Why can't you just listen?
You should've stayed in the car.
You shouldn't have followed me to the subway.
That was the man from the subway.
We have to go.
Let's go.
Look.
-Hold on. -[Rachel] What are you doing?
[Ray, softly] Sit down.
If anything goes wrong, you tell them everything.
translation.ko: 일이 틀어지면 저 경찰한테 다 털어놔

translation.en: Your business with me is done.
Shah's dead.
Hmm. Shah didn't hire me.
My contract is to take out anyone who can implicate my employer.
translation.ko: 내 고용주 발목을 잡는 자들을 제거하는 게 내 임무지

translation.en: Who else are you hunting?
Only the one sitting next to me.
Something for you, darling?
No.
I know your struggle.
I do.
The village I grew up in,
we were farmers.
I worked in the fields with my father.
And one day, a group of rebels came.
They slaughtered my entire village. Everyone. Whole family, friends.
translation.ko: 마을 주민을 전부 학살했어 온 가족과 내 친구들까지

translation.en: I was able to hide in the weeds.
Now, you gotta understand, I was just a kid, know that?
In such pain, with such… rage
that for years, I hunted them one by one.
translation.ko: 분노 때문에 난 오랫동안 놈들을 하나씩 없앴지

translation.en: -Then you understand. -[hit man] I do.
You see, what I've learned in that process
is that there will always be an opposing force.
translation.ko: 그 과정에서 배운 게 있는데 적은 늘 존재할 거야

translation.en: No amount of revenge can change that.
translation.ko: 제아무리 복수해도 그 사실은 안 변해

translation.en: So you see, in this case,
you are my village,
and I am the opposing force.
[clicks tongue] Well, there's three ways this goes down.
One, I tell those cops who we are
translation.ko: 첫째, 저 경찰들한테 우리 정체를 밝히면

translation.en: and this gets real ugly for both of us.
Two,
I walk out the front door,
spend the rest of my life hiding in the four corners of this earth,
and neither of us get what we want.
Or three,
you tell me who hired you.
We both know I'm gonna go after them.
translation.ko: 피차 알다시피 난 그자를 쫓을 텐데

translation.en: And when I do,
you can try to take another shot at me.
translation.ko: 당신이 날 또 겨냥할 수 있지

translation.en: This way,
at least one of us gets what we want.
Nah.
No, you've killed a few men, but…
their deaths are still fresh in your eyes.
You're a dilettante in my world.
I never set out to kill anyone.
Not like you.
You are not innocent.
You knew going after powerful people was a dangerous business.
translation.ko: 힘 있는 자들을 노리면 위험하다는 거 알았잖아

translation.en: You jumped.
I'm just the pavement closing in.
Diana Morgan.
The person you're looking for.
The senator.
See you in Pittsburgh.
Rachel.
I'll see ya soon.
Rothman, you have kids.
Does the idea of Rachel Cooper
being dragged through all of this bother you at all?
translation.ko: 레이철 쿠퍼가 이런 일에 휘말렸다니 마음에 걸리지 않나요?

translation.en: Every case we work has me worried about my kids one way or another.
translation.ko: 난 어떤 사건을 맡건 결국 애들 걱정이지

translation.en: I keep thinking about her.
I mean, how's…
how's a kid supposed to get past all that she's seen?
I feel like…
I feel like I need to protect her somehow.
translation.ko: 어떻게든 그 애를 보호해야 할 것 같아요

translation.en: -Just do the work-- -[agent] Memo came through.
-Search crew found Cooper's vehicle. -Where?
[agent] In the woods, 20 miles outside Shah's compound.
Looks like local PD got a call this morning
translation.ko: 오전에 지역 경찰이 접수한 신고를 보면

translation.en: that a tow truck was stolen at a nearby location.
We need eyes on all street cameras on Route 8.
-[agent] I'm on it. -Thank you.
Okay. Fort Pitt Tunnel. Only 12 minutes away.
translation.ko: 자, 포트 피트 터널에 왔으니 12분 남았네요

translation.en: War room.
Hey, guys. We got a hit on that tow truck. It's headed back to the city.
translation.ko: 도난당한 견인차를 찾았는데 시내로 돌아가고 있대요

translation.en: [dispatcher 1, on radio] Suspect is in a red tow truck. 10-80.
translation.ko: 빨간색 견인차를 탄 용의자를 추격 중이다

translation.en: License plate Romeo Tango One Seven
Uniform Alpha Sierra.
[officer 1] We may have something here. Westbound on Liberty passing 16th.
translation.ko: 의심 차량을 포착했다 16번가 지나 리버티가에서 서쪽으로 간다

translation.en: [Rachel] The chopper! It's on us.
[officer 1] We've got eyes on the suspect. Making a right turn on 9th.
North on 9th. Picking up speed. Making a run for it.
All right. Hold on, baby.
[Rachel] Oh shit!
[officer 2, over speaker] Police! Stop the vehicle now!
-Where's the chopper? -It's on your right. On your right.
[officer 2] Pull over.
-Get outta the way! -[people scream]
Oh shit!
-God damn it! Hold on. Hang on! -[Rachel screams]
[dispatcher 1, on radio] All units, suspect is armed and dangerous.
translation.ko: 전 대원에게 알린다 용의자는 무장했고 위험하다

translation.en: I repeat, armed and dangerous.
[Ray] The game's letting out.
[quietly] Oh shit!
-[dispatcher 2] Got eyes on the suspect. -[officer 3] On the move!
translation.ko: 용의자가 보인다, 반복한다 - 용의자가 움직인다 - 이동해!

translation.en: [officer 4, on radio] Suspect on foot. I repeat, suspect on foot.
[dispatcher 2] Suspect is entering PNC Park.
-[Meeker] Everybody clear. FBI! -[Rothman] Move! Out of the way!
[Meeker] If he's down here, we squeeze him out.
I'll take the upper level.
PPD, cover this level. The rest, go upstairs.
translation.ko: 경찰은 이 층을 맡으세요 나머지는 위층으로!

translation.en: -[officer 5] Suspect spotted. -[crowd cheering]
Suspect spotted on the upper level.
Get me agents to the roof, now!
[Rothman] Move!
-[officer 7] I got eyes on. -[Rothman] Copy.
[Meeker] Wait!
Wait.
Okay. [gasps]
It wasn't right what happened to you. I understand that.
Look, no one is gonna hurt you.
It's me. I'm here to help.
Okay?
-[somber music playing] -I don't know you.
Yes, you do. We've…
We've been talking.
No. Paloma.
You told me your stuffed bunny's name was Paloma.
Remember?
It wasn't supposed to be like this.
[Meeker] Your father was a good man.
[Meeker] You are not him.
-[Meeker] Say your name. -[Rachel gasps]
[Meeker] You are in control.
[sighs] Fuck.
You're nothing but a scared little--
[hit man] Rachel.
I'll see ya soon.
[echoing] Say your name.
[Ray, echoing] Rachel.
We're gonna be okay.
[Meeker] He shouldn't have been killed.
Come on, just… say… your name.
translation.ko: 얼른 말해 봐 네 이름 말이야

translation.en: [Meeker] Just say your name!
Rachel Cooper.
Yeah.
[dispatcher 2] We have a positive identification of the suspect.
Her name is Rachel Cooper.
No. No, no, no, Rachel!
[Meeker] Her name is Rachel Cooper.
Eighteen years of age.
[paramedic] Any family to contact?
[Meeker] Both parents deceased.
-[grunts] -Okay, calm down!
[driver] No!
[Meeker] Rachel, stop!
There you are.
I'm scared.
I feel like the whole world's gone crazy.
translation.ko: 마치 온 세상이 미쳐 버린 것 같아요

translation.en: Or maybe it's just me.
I'm tired.
Nobody cares about stopping them.
Besides me.
Will I ever get to see you and Mom again?
[softly] We're with you now.
[Morgan] The fight begins here.
Big business and corporate interests
have corroded our politics.
[Morgan] And I believe that our country is on the verge of imploding.
translation.ko: 저는 우리 나라가 파열 직전이라고 봅니다

translation.en: Of rotting. Rotting from the inside out.
[Morgan] We need someone who will clean…
[Morgan and crowd] …out the rot!
translation.ko: 누군가 그 썩은 뿌리를… - 뽑아야 한다! - 썩은 뿌리를 뽑아야죠

translation.en: -Clean out the rot! -[crowd cheers]
Today, I am announcing my bid
to be your next senator from the great state of Pennsylvania.
[chuckles] That's right.
And to big business politics,
we have one thing to say.
This is our state,
and it is not for sale!
[staffer] Well done.
Entering the race is just the beginning.
Let's focus on what we wanna do when we win.
-[sighs] -[Ray] Where'd you get this?
-It's Mom's. -[Ray chuckles]
Actually, it's mine.
I took your mom to a Steelers game shortly after we met,
translation.ko: 사귄 지 얼마 안 돼서 엄마랑 풋볼 보러 갔다가

translation.en: and it was freezing, and I gave her my jacket.
translation.ko: 너무 춥길래 내 재킷을 벗어 줬는데

translation.en: And she never gave it back.
Well, now it's my turn to steal it from her.
[Rachel] It's my turn to steal it from her.
[Ray] Come on, baby.
Get up.
[Ray, emphatically] Get up, sweet girl.
[Rachel] Calling the FBI.
And when they get here,
you're gonna tell them everything you did with BioPrime.
Go ahead. Or better yet, let me.
I think the FBI is looking for you,
Rachel.
You know me?
You're all over the news.
I've seen what you did.
[Morgan] You bring the FBI here, and…
who do you think they're gonna arrest?
-The crazy girl who killed five men? -No.
translation.ko: 다섯 명을 죽인 미친 여자애? 아니면 나?

translation.en: -[Morgan] Or me? -No. We never meant to hurt anyone.
translation.ko: 다섯 명을 죽인 미친 여자애? 아니면 나? 우린 누구도 해칠 생각 없었어요

translation.en: I understand, and I can help you.
I think I'm the only one who can.
-I can make this nightmare end. -Shut up!
-You're the one behind BioPrime. -I wrestled them into submission.
translation.ko: 당신이 바이오프라임의 배후죠? 난 그쪽의 무릎을 꿇렸어

translation.en: I got them to lower their prices. Affordable treatment.
translation.ko: 약값을 내리게 했잖아 저렴한 치료를 위해서

translation.en: And you cleaned out the rot.
I'm fighting for you, sweetheart.
When I saw you on CNN when my mom was in the hospital,
translation.ko: CNN에서 당신을 봤을 때 엄마가 입원 중이셨는데

translation.en: I thought you could actually save her.
I believed in you.
-[shakily] You still can. -How?
[inhales sharply] I know people at the DOJ.
They can make the charges against you go away.
translation.ko: 그쪽에서 네 혐의를 다 벗겨 주면

translation.en: And you can have a life.
What you've been through, what happened to you, was wrong, Rachel.
translation.ko: 네가 겪은 일들은 옳지 않았어, 레이철

translation.en: The trauma you suffered.
Don't you think they'd want me to help you, sweetheart?
translation.ko: 부모님도 내가 널 돕길 바라지 않으실까, 얘?

translation.en: -[gasps] -Stop calling me that. You're a liar.
You were with BioPrime even then.
You helped them take away
a cheap and lifesaving medication for my mom.
translation.ko: 엄마를 살릴 뻔했던 값싼 약을 앗아 갔지

translation.en: I fought against them! [panting]
You took their bribe, and you gave them exclusive contracts.
translation.ko: 그쪽 뇌물을 받고 독점 계약을 내줬잖아

translation.en: You're responsible for ordering the hit on Martin Bennett.
You killed my dad.
[softly] Now tell the truth.
-[Morgan gasps] -[firmly] Tell me the truth.
Yeah.
I took the bribe.
I ordered the hit.
You don't understand anything. You're so young.
The candidate with the most money wins.
That's how it works.
Was it worth it?
Was it worth it?
Security?
[yelling] Security!
She kills Keeley and runs. Tries to escape, but something or someone
translation.ko: 킬리를 죽이고 달아나서 탈주하려다가 어떤 목적이나 누굴 노리고 돌아온 거예요

translation.en: drove her back here, despite knowing she might be caught.
translation.ko: 어떤 목적이나 누굴 노리고 돌아온 거예요 잡힐 것까지 각오하고요

translation.en: [Rothman] Yeah, but she got her revenge. Why come back?
-[agent] Just came in. -Thank you, sir.
-Holy shit. -[Meeker] What?
[Rothman] Rachel Cooper was spotted
at Diana Morgan's campaign rally yesterday afternoon.
[Meeker] What was she doing there?
[reporter on TV] The fugitive from last night's assassination attempt…
translation.ko: 어젯밤 다이애나 모건 의원을 암살하려 한 범인은

translation.en: [Rachel] Thanks.
…on Diana Morgan is still on the loose.
Pittsburgh police are asking anyone with information to please come forward.
translation.ko: 경찰은 시민 여러분께 제보를 요청하고 있습니다

translation.en: [Rothman] First Keeley, then Shah, now a congresswoman?
It just seems so bizarre.
[Meeker] Rachel clearly knows something.
Let's go through Diana Morgan's campaign donations.
translation.ko: 다이애나 모건의 선거 운동 기부금을 살펴보죠

translation.en: [Meeker] Look at this. Rachel Cooper just sent us something.
translation.ko: 이것 보세요 레이철 쿠퍼가 방금 뭘 보냈네요

translation.en: [Morgan on recording] I took the bribe. I ordered the hit.
The candidate with the most money wins.
That's how it works.
[reporter on TV] …developments in the assassination attempt.
translation.ko: 다이애나 모건 암살 기도 사건이 새 국면을 맞았는데요

translation.en: According to sources, the FBI has arrested the congresswoman
translation.ko: 소식통에 따르면 FBI가 모건 의원을 체포했으며

translation.en: regarding her connection to the recent murders of BioPrime executives
translation.ko: 체포 사유는 최근 살해된 바이오프라임 임원

translation.en: Simon Keeley and Vinod Shah
and the two-year-old unsolved murders of Martin Bennett and Ray Cooper.
translation.ko: 2년 전 미제로 남은 마틴 베넷과 레이 쿠퍼의 살인 사건으로

translation.en: Neither BioPrime or the FBI would comment on this ongoing investigation.
translation.ko: 바이오프라임과 FBI 모두 진행 중인 수사에 관해 함구했습니다

translation.en: …Pennsylvania is allegedly connected to the deaths of reporter Martin Bennett
translation.ko: 펜실베이니아주 상원 의원이 2년 전 기자 마틴 베넷과

translation.en: and Rachel Cooper's father nearly two years ago.
translation.ko: 레이철 쿠퍼 아버지의 살인 사건에 연루됐습니다

translation.en: [Ray] The past is like a dream.
A mosaic of images and feelings
that offers some truth about how we got here,
translation.ko: 우릴 현재로 이끈 일말의 진실을 나타내지

translation.en: even if details have blurred with time.
Parents and their children.
Where do we stop…
[Rachel] …and they begin?
